tm85.effect_long: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.
tm85.effect_short: Teaches Dream Eater to a compatible Pokémon.
tm85.name: TM85

tm86.description:
The user snares the target with grass and
trips it. The heavier the target, the greater
the move’s power.
tm86.effect_long: Teaches Grass Knot to a compatible Pokémon.
tm86.effect_short: Teaches Grass Knot to a compatible Pokémon.
tm86.name: TM86

tm87.description:
The user enrages and confuses the
target. However, this also sharply raises
the target’s Attack stat.
tm87.effect_long: Teaches Swagger to a compatible Pokémon.
tm87.effect_short: Teaches Swagger to a compatible Pokémon.
tm87.name: TM87

tm88.description:
While it is asleep, the user randomly uses
one of the moves it knows.
tm88.effect_long: Teaches Pluck to a compatible Pokémon.
tm88.effect_short: Teaches Pluck to a compatible Pokémon.
tm88.name: TM88

tm89.description:
After making its attack, the user
rushes back to switch places with a
party Pokémon in waiting.
tm89.effect_long: Teaches U-Turn to a compatible Pokémon.
tm89.effect_short: Teaches U-turn to a compatible Pokémon.
tm89.name: TM89

tm90.description:
The user makes a copy of itself using
some of its HP. The copy serves as
the user’s decoy.
tm90.effect_long: Teaches Substitute to a compatible Pokémon.
tm90.effect_short: Teaches Substitute to a compatible Pokémon.
tm90.name: TM90

tm91.description:
The user gathers all its light energy
and releases it at once. This may also
lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
tm91.effect_long: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.
tm91.effect_short: Teaches Flash Cannon to a compatible Pokémon.
tm91.name: TM91

tm92.description:
The user creates a bizarre area in
which slower Pokémon get to move
first for five turns.
tm92.effect_long: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.
tm92.effect_short: Teaches Trick Room to a compatible Pokémon.
tm92.name: TM92

tm93.description:
The user shrouds itself in electricity
and smashes into its target.
This also damages the user a little.
tm93.effect_long: Teaches Wild-Charge to a compatible Pokémon.
tm93.effect_short: Teaches Wild Charge to a compatible Pokémon.
tm93.name: TM93

tm94.description:
The user attacks with a punch. This may
also lower the target’s Defense stat. This
move can also shatter rocks in the field.
tm94.effect_long: Teaches Rock-Smash to a compatible Pokémon.
tm94.effect_short: Teaches Rock Smash to a compatible Pokémon.
tm94.name: TM94

tm95.description:
The user yells as if it’s ranting about
something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat
of opposing Pokémon.
tm95.effect_long: Teaches Snarl to a compatible Pokémon.
tm95.effect_short: Teaches Snarl to a compatible Pokémon.
tm95.name: TM95

tm96.description:
An attack that makes use of nature’s
power. Its effects vary depending on
the user’s environment.
tm96.name: TM96

tm97.description:
The user releases a horrible aura
imbued with dark thoughts. This
may also make the target flinch.
tm97.name: TM97

tm98.description:
Striking opponents over and over
makes the user’s fists harder.
Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
tm98.name: TM98

tm99.description:
The user damages opposing Pokémon
by emitting a powerful flash.
tm99.name: TM99

tmv-pass.description:
A commuter pass that allows the
holder to ride the TMV between Lumiose
City and Kiloude City at any time.
tmv-pass.name: TMV Pass

town-map.description:
A very convenient map that can be
viewed anytime. It even shows you
your present location in the region.
town-map.effect_long: Displays a map of the region including the trainer's position, location names, visited towns, gym locations, and where the trainer has been walking recently.
town-map.effect_short: Use to see the overworld map.
town-map.name: Town Map

toxic-orb.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a bizarre orb that will badly
poison the holder during battle.
toxic-orb.effect_long: Held: Badly poisons the holder at the end of each turn.
toxic-orb.effect_short: Held: Inflicts Toxic on the holder at the end of the turn. Activates after Poison damage would occur.
toxic-orb.fling_effect_short: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
toxic-orb.name: Toxic Orb

toxic-plate.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It’s a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Poison-type moves.
toxic-plate.effect_long:
Held: Increases the power of the holder's Poison moves by 20%.
Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder's type becomes Poison.
toxic-plate.effect_short: Held: Posion-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus's and Judgment's type to Posion.
toxic-plate.name: Toxic Plate

tri-pass.description:
A pass for ferries between ONE,
TWO, and THREE ISLAND.
It has a drawing of three islands.
tri-pass.effect_long: Provides access to the first three Sevii Islands.
tri-pass.effect_short: Grants access to the first three Sevii Islands.
tri-pass.name: Tri-Pass

tropic-mail.description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
BELLOSSOM print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.
tropic-mail.effect_long:
Used to send short messages to other players via Pokémon trading.  Trainer may compose a message from a finite list of words when giving this item to a Pokémon.  Once taken and read, a message may be erased and this item can be reused, or the message may be stored in the trainer's PC.

Held
:   Holder cannot be placed in the PC.  Any move attempting to remove this item from the holder will fail.
tropic-mail.effect_short: Lets a Trainer write a message and send it via Pokémon trade.
tropic-mail.name: Tropic Mail

tunnel-mail.description:
Stationery featuring a print of a dimly
lit coal mine.
Let a Pokémon hold it for delivery.
tunnel-mail.effect_long:
Used to send short messages to other players via Pokémon trading.  Trainer may compose a message from a finite list of words when giving this item to a Pokémon.  Once taken and read, a message may be erased and this item can be reused, or the message may be stored in the trainer's PC.

Held
:   Holder cannot be placed in the PC.  Any move attempting to remove this item from the holder will fail.
tunnel-mail.effect_short: Lets a Trainer write a message and send it via Pokémon trade.
tunnel-mail.name: Tunnel Mail

twisted-spoon.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
This spoon is imbued with telekinetic
power and boosts Psychic-type moves.
twisted-spoon.effect_long: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Psychic moves by 20%.
twisted-spoon.effect_short: Held: Psychic-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.
twisted-spoon.name: Twisted Spoon

tyranitarite.description:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Tyranitar hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
tyranitarite.name: Tyranitarite

ultra-ball.description:
An ultra-high-performance Poké Ball
that provides a higher success rate for
catching Pokémon than a Great Ball.
ultra-ball.effect_long:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 2×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
ultra-ball.effect_short: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 2×.
ultra-ball.name: Ultra Ball

unown-report.description:
A report of all the discovered kinds
of Unown.
unown-report.effect_long: Lists which Unown forms the trainer has caught.
unown-report.effect_short: Keeps track of Unown types caught.
unown-report.name: Unown Report

up-grade.description:
A transparent device somehow
filled with all sorts of data.
It was produced by Silph Co.
up-grade.effect_long: Held by Porygon: Evolves the holder into Porygon2 when traded.
up-grade.effect_short: Traded on a Porygon: Holder evolves into Porygon2.
up-grade.name: Up-Grade

venusaurite.description:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Venusaur hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
venusaurite.name: Venusaurite

vs-recorder.description:
An amazing device that can record a
battle between friends or the battles
at certain special battle facilities.
vs-recorder.effect_long:
Optionally records wireless, Wi-Fi, and Battle Frontier battles.

Tracks Battle Points earned in the Battle Frontier, and stores commemorative prints.
vs-recorder.effect_short: Records wireless, Wi-Fi, or Battle Frontier battles, and stores points.
vs-recorder.name: Vs. Recorder

vs-seeker.description:
A device that indicates Trainers who
want to battle. Its battery charges
while you walk.
vs-seeker.effect_long: Reveals trainers who want a rematch, by showing !! over their heads.  Each use drains the battery; requires 100 steps to charge.
vs-seeker.effect_short: Allows rebattling of on-screen trainers. 100 steps to recharge.
vs-seeker.name: Vs. Seeker

wacan-berry.description:
If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will
lessen the damage taken from one
supereffective Electric-type attack.
wacan-berry.effect_long:
Held in battle
:   When the holder would take super-effective Electric-type damage, it consumes this item to halve the amount of damage taken.
wacan-berry.effect_short: Held: Consumed when struck by a super-effective Electric-type attack to halve the damage.
wacan-berry.name: Wacan Berry

wailmer-pail.description:
A nifty watering pail.
Use it to promote strong growth in
BERRIES planted in soft soil.
wailmer-pail.name: Wailmer Pail

water-gem.description:
A gem with an essence of water.
When held, it strengthens the power
of a Water-type move one time.
water-gem.effect_long:
Held
:   When the holder uses a damaging Water-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
water-gem.effect_short: Held: When the holder uses a damaging Water-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
water-gem.name: Water Gem

water-stone.description:
A peculiar stone that can make
certain species of Pokémon evolve.
It is the blue of a pool of clear water.
water-stone.effect_long:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an Eevee into Vaporeon, a Lombre into Ludicolo, a Panpour into Simipour, a Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, a Shellder into Cloyster, or a Staryu into Starmie.
water-stone.effect_short: Evolves an Eevee into Vaporeon, a Lombre into Ludicolo, a Panpour into Simipour, a Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, a Shellder into Cloyster, or a Staryu into Starmie.
water-stone.name: Water Stone

watmel-berry.description:
A Berry to be used in cooking.
This Berry is very rare and hard
to obtain in the Unova region.
watmel-berry.effect_long: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.
watmel-berry.effect_short: Used for creating PokéBlocks and Poffins.
watmel-berry.name: Watmel Berry

wave-incense.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
This exotic-smelling incense boosts
the power of Water-type moves.
wave-incense.effect_long: Held: Increases the power of the holder's Water moves by 20%.
wave-incense.effect_short: Held: Water-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Mantine begets a Mantyke Egg.
wave-incense.name: Wave Incense

wave-mail.description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
WAILMER print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.
wave-mail.effect_long:
Used to send short messages to other players via Pokémon trading.  Trainer may compose a message from a finite list of words when giving this item to a Pokémon.  Once taken and read, a message may be erased and this item can be reused, or the message may be stored in the trainer's PC.

Held
:   Holder cannot be placed in the PC.  Any move attempting to remove this item from the holder will fail.
wave-mail.effect_short: Lets a Trainer write a message and send it via Pokémon trade.
wave-mail.name: Wave Mail

weakness-policy.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
Attack and Sp. Atk sharply increase
if the holder is hit with a move it’s weak to.
weakness-policy.name: Weakness Policy

wepear-berry.description:
A Berry to be used in cooking.
This Berry is very rare and hard
to obtain in the Unova region.
wepear-berry.effect_long: No effect; only useful for planting and cooking.
wepear-berry.effect_short: Used for creating PokéBlocks and Poffins.
wepear-berry.name: Wepear Berry

whipped-dream.description:
A soft and sweet treat made of fluffy,
puffy, whipped and whirled cream.
It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.
whipped-dream.name: Whipped Dream

white-apricorn.description:
A white Apricorn.
It doesn’t smell like anything.
white-apricorn.effect_long: May be given to Kurt in Azalea-Town to produce a Fast-Ball.
white-apricorn.effect_short: Used to make a Fast Ball.
white-apricorn.name: White Apricorn

white-flute.description:
A lovely toy flute to admire.
It’s made from white glass.
white-flute.effect_long:
Used outside of battle
:   Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.
white-flute.effect_short: Doubles the wild Pokémon encounter rate.
white-flute.name: White Flute

white-herb.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It will restore any lowered stat in
battle. It can be used only once.
white-herb.effect_long:
Held in battle
:   At the end of each turn, if any of the holder's stats have a negative stat modifier, the holder consumes this item to remove the modifiers from those stats.
white-herb.effect_short: Held: Resets all lowered stats to normal at end of turn. Consumed after use.
white-herb.fling_effect_long: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  [Drains]{mechanic:drain} half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
white-herb.fling_effect_short: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
white-herb.name: White Herb

wide-lens.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It’s a magnifying lens that slightly
boosts the accuracy of moves.
wide-lens.effect_long: Held: Increases the accuracy of any move the holder uses by 10% (multiplied; i.e. 70% accuracy is increased to 77%).
wide-lens.effect_short: Held: Provides a 1/10 (10%) boost in accuracy to the holder.
wide-lens.name: Wide Lens

wiki-berry.description:
If held by a Pokémon, it restores the
user’s HP in a pinch, but it will cause
confusion if the user hates the taste.
wiki-berry.effect_long:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max HP remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes dry flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers Special Attack), it will also become confused.
wiki-berry.effect_short: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to restore 1/8 max HP. Confuses Pokémon that dislike dry flavor.
wiki-berry.fling_effect_long: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to [poison]{mechanic:poison} the target.
wiki-berry.fling_effect_short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to [poison]{mechanic:poison} the target.
wiki-berry.name: Wiki Berry

wise-glasses.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
This thick pair of glasses slightly
boosts the power of special moves.
wise-glasses.effect_long: Held: Increases the power of the holder's special moves by 10%.
wise-glasses.effect_short: Held: Boosts the damage of special moves used by the holder by 1/10 (10%).
wise-glasses.name: Wise Glasses

wood-mail.description:
A piece of MAIL featuring a cute
SLAKOTH print.
It is to be held by a POKéMON.
wood-mail.effect_long:
Used to send short messages to other players via Pokémon trading.  Trainer may compose a message from a finite list of words when giving this item to a Pokémon.  Once taken and read, a message may be erased and this item can be reused, or the message may be stored in the trainer's PC.

Held
:   Holder cannot be placed in the PC.  Any move attempting to remove this item from the holder will fail.
wood-mail.effect_short: Lets a Trainer write a message and send it via Pokémon trade.
wood-mail.name: Wood Mail

works-key.description:
A large key for operating the doors of
the Valley Windworks in the canyon.
It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.
works-key.effect_long: Opens the front door of the Valley Windworks.  Reusable.
works-key.name: Works Key

x-accuracy.description:
An item that boosts the accuracy of
a Pokémon during a battle. It wears
off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.
x-accuracy.effect_long:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's accuracy by one stage.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
x-accuracy.effect_short: Raises accuracy by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.
x-accuracy.name: X Accuracy

x-accuracy-2.description:
It sharply raises the accuracy of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.
x-accuracy-2.effect_long:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's accuracy by two stages.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
x-accuracy-2.effect_short: Raises accuracy by two stages in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.
x-accuracy-2.name: X Accuracy 2

x-accuracy-3.description:
It drastically raises the accuracy of a
Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.
x-accuracy-3.effect_long:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's accuracy by three stages.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
x-accuracy-3.effect_short: Raises accuracy by three stages in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.
x-accuracy-3.name: X Accuracy 3

x-accuracy-6.description:
It raises the accuracy of a Pokémon
in battle immensely. It wears off if the
Pokémon is withdrawn.
x-accuracy-6.effect_long:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle

This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
x-accuracy-6.effect_short: Raises accuracy by six stages in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.
x-accuracy-6.name: X Accuracy 6

xtransceiver.description:
A high-tech transceiver with a
camera function. It allows up to
four-way calls.
xtransceiver.effect_long: Makes four-way video calls.  Used for plot advancement in-game, but also works with other players via the C-Gear.
xtransceiver.name: Xtransceiver

yache-berry.description:
If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will
lessen the damage taken from one
supereffective Ice-type attack.
yache-berry.effect_long:
Held in battle
:   When the holder would take super-effective Ice-type damage, it consumes this item to halve the amount of damage taken.
yache-berry.effect_short: Held: Consumed when struck by a super-effective Ice-type attack to halve the damage.
yache-berry.name: Yache Berry

yellow-apricorn.description:
A yellow Apricorn.
It has an invigorating scent.
yellow-apricorn.effect_long: May be given to Kurt in Azalea-Town to produce a Moon-Ball.
yellow-apricorn.effect_short: Used to make a Moon Ball.
yellow-apricorn.name: Yellow Apricorn

yellow-flute.description:
A lovely toy flute to admire.
It’s made from yellow glass.
yellow-flute.effect_long:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Cures confusion.
yellow-flute.name: Yellow Flute

yellow-scarf.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
During a Contest, it raises the Tough
aspect of the Pokémon holding it.
yellow-scarf.effect_long: Held: Increases the holder's Toughness during a Super Contest's Visual Competition.
yellow-scarf.effect_short: Raises the holder's Toughness while in a contest.
yellow-scarf.name: Yellow Scarf

yellow-shard.description:
A small yellow shard. It appears
to be a fragment of some sort
of implement made long ago.
yellow-shard.effect_long:
No effect.

In Diamond and Pearl, trade ten for a Sandstorm TM in the house midway along the southern section of Sinnoh-Route-212.

In Platinum, trade to move tutors on Sinnoh-Route-212, in Snowpoint-City, and in the Survival-Area.  Eight shards total are required per tutelage, but the particular combination of colors varies by move.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for an Aspear-Berry, a Iapapa-Berry, and a Sitrus-Berry with the Juggler near the Pokémon Center in Violet-City.

In HeartGold and SoulSilver, trade one for a Grepa-Berry, a Nomel-Berry, and a Pinap-Berry with the Juggler near the Pal-Park entrance in Fuchsia-City.
yellow-shard.effect_short: No effect. Can be traded for items or moves.
yellow-shard.name: Yellow Shard

zap-plate.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It’s a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Electric-type moves.
zap-plate.effect_long:
Held: Increases the power of the holder's Electric moves by 20%.
Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder's type becomes Electric.
zap-plate.effect_short: Held: Electric-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus's and Judgment's type to Electric.
zap-plate.name: Zap Plate

zinc.description:
A nutritious drink for Pokémon.
When consumed, it raises the base
Sp. Def stat of a single Pokémon.
zinc.effect_long:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Increases Special Defense effort by 10, but won't increase it beyond 100.  Increases happiness by 5/3/2.
zinc.name: Zinc

zoom-lens.description:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
If the holder moves after its target
moves, its accuracy will be boosted.
zoom-lens.effect_long:
Held: Raises the holder's Accuracy by 20% when it goes last.
Ingame description is incorrect.
zoom-lens.effect_short: Held: Provides a 1/5 (20%) boost in accuracy if the holder moves after the target.
zoom-lens.name: Zoom Lens
